meta.title: bosq.dev - Advanced Data & AI Solutions
meta.description: Bosq provides cutting-edge data and AI products including data marketplace, multi-agent systems, and ETL platforms. Custom consultancy and on-demand solutions for enterprises.
meta.ogDescription: Bosq provides cutting-edge data and AI products including data marketplace, multi-agent systems, and ETL platforms. Custom consultancy and on-demand solutions for enterprises.

hero.title: Advanced Data & AI Solutions
hero.subtitle: Empowering businesses with cutting-edge data platforms, intelligent agent systems, and seamless ETL solutions. Transform your data into actionable insights.

about.title: About Bosq
about.description1: We are a forward-thinking technology company specializing in data and AI solutions. Our mission is to democratize access to advanced data technologies and make AI accessible to businesses of all sizes.
about.description2: With our suite of products and custom consultancy services, we help organizations unlock the full potential of their data, streamline operations, and drive innovation through intelligent automation.
about.imageAlt: Modern data center with AI visualization
about.cardDesc: Our cutting-edge infrastructure and AI-driven solutions power the next generation of data-centric applications.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Three powerful platforms designed to revolutionize how you work with data and AI

market.title: Data Market
market.description: A comprehensive marketplace where organizations can securely buy and sell high-quality datasets. Connect data providers with data consumers in a trusted environment.

agents.title: Multi-Agent System
agents.description: Build and deploy sophisticated multi-agent AI systems with our intuitive configuration platform. Connect, orchestrate, and scale intelligent agents effortlessly.

etl.title: ETL Platform
etl.description: Seamlessly extract, transform, and load data from multiple sources including SQL databases, web scraping, SharePoint, and NoSQL systems with no-code transformations.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your business with our data and AI solutions? Let's discuss your custom requirements.
contact.name: Name

footer.tagline: Transforming businesses through data and AI
